appbar.step3: Add A Consent Widget To Your Website

abandonedCarts.headerInfo: The List displays all the Abandoned Carts your Wix Store had after installing Facebook Cart Recovery, regardless of whether they subscribed or not to receive notifications from Facebook.
abandonedCarts.custRangeInfo: Select a start date and an end date to see the data for that specific period.

fbCard1.tooltipText: Connect the Facebook page that will send messages to users. All the messages that the app provides will be sent by your Facebook page.Your personal details,including name will not be visible to message recipients
fbCard1.buttonFooter: If you don't have a facebook page, you can create one

fbCard2.info: Connect the Facebook page that will send messages to users. All the messages that the app provides will be sent by your Facebook page.Your personal details,including name will not be visible to message recipients
fbCard2.subheader: Choose the Facebook page that will be used to send messages to your users
fbCard2.dropdownSubText: The Facebook messages will be sent by the selected Page. Your name or other personal details will not be visible to users that receive your messages.

upgradeCard.body3: individual Facebook cart recovery attempts, with up to 2 messages per recovery attempt.
upgradeCard.body4: cart recovery attempts left this month.

accInfoCard.tooltipText: Add your contact information information. We will use your email to send you reports about app performance such as recovered sales.

tzCard.tooltipText: Add your timezone. All the displayed dates will be relative to the chosen timezone.
tzCard.label: Select Timezone
